LanguageData.FungiponicsBasin.label: Cuenca fungipónica
LanguageData.FungiponicsBasin.description: Derivada de las cuencas hidroponicas, la cuenca fungipónica está diseñada para cultivar plantas de cuevas. Sólo requiere un poco de materia orgánica inicial para empezar a crecer. Sembrar setas es difícil y esas plantas crecen a su propio ritmo!
LanguageData.FungiponicsBasin_Blueprint.label: fungiponics basin (blueprint)
LanguageData.FungiponicsBasin_Frame.label: fungiponics basin (building)
LanguageData.FungiponicsBasin_Frame.description: Derived from the hydroponics basins, the fungiponics basin is designed to grow cave plants. Does only require some initial organic matter to start growing. Sowing mushrooms is difficult and those plants grow at their own pace!
